chunk:
Marie Veronique Treatment Oil

Brand: Marie Veronique

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Cucurbita Pepo (Pumpkin) Seed Oil, Emu Oil, Borago Officinalis (Borage) Seed Oil, Salix Nigra (Willow) Bark Extract, Mixed Tocopherols (Vitamin E), Vaccinium Macrocarpon (Cranberry) Seed Oil, Calophyllum

Pepo (Pumpkin) Seed Oil, Emu Oil, Borago Officinalis (Borage) Seed Oil, Salix Nigra (Willow) Bark Extract, Mixed Tocopherols (Vitamin E), Vaccinium Macrocarpon (Cranberry) Seed Oil, Calophyllum Inophyllum (Tamanu) Seed Oil, Rubus Idaeus (Red Raspberry) Seed Oil, Sambucus Nigra (Elderberry) Extract, Euterpe Oleracea (Acai) Oil, Squalane, Hippophae

(Cranberry) Seed Oil, Calophyllum Inophyllum (Tamanu) Seed Oil, Rubus Idaeus (Red Raspberry) Seed Oil, Sambucus Nigra (Elderberry) Extract, Euterpe Oleracea (Acai) Oil, Squalane, Hippophae Rhamnoides (Sea Buckthorn) Oil, Citrullus Lanatus (Watermelon) Seed Oil, Argania Spinosa (Argan) Kernel Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil*, Rosmarinus

(Acai) Oil, Squalane, Hippophae Rhamnoides (Sea Buckthorn) Oil, Citrullus Lanatus (Watermelon) Seed Oil, Argania Spinosa (Argan) Kernel Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil*, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Oleoresin, Curcuma Longa/Xanthorrhiza (Turmeric) Root Extract, Cymbopogon (Palmarosa) Martini Oil*, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree)

Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil*, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Oleoresin, Curcuma Longa/Xanthorrhiza (Turmeric) Root Extract, Cymbopogon (Palmarosa) Martini Oil*, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Oil*, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Oil, Usnea Barbata (Lichen) Extract, Daucus Carota Sativa (Carrot) Seed Extract

Directions: Shake well. Dispense approximately 1/2 dropper and warm between palms. Smooth over face/neck/chest, avoiding eye contour area. If irritation occurs, discontinue use and consult a physician. Keep in a cool, dry place, out of direct light. Use within 6 months of opening.
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
